snippet: How much is Facebook worth? The company, which was projected to surpass $3 billion in revenue in 2011, is expected garner a market value of up to $100 billion with its initial public offering later this year.
abstract: How much is Facebook worth? The company, which was projected to surpass $3 billion in revenue in 2011, is expected garner a market value of up to $100 billion with its initial public offering later this year.
